duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive the vision and execution of digital products (i.e., software applications) or elements of a product, and develop long-term product plans.
Conduct competitive analyses and use product discovery techniques to aid in prioritization of features.
Lead stakeholders through the roadmap process for assigned product(s).
Monitor and report on product utilization and identify trends.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in information technology, computer science, marketing, business administration or related field (Master's preferred).
